title: Cormac McCarthy's book cover type
content:
Hello, type experts!  
I love Cormac McCarthy's books, especially these newly designed series.  
Could someone identify the type of Cormac McCarthy's No Country for Old Men?  
Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [no\_country\_for\_old\_men\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130831055057/http:/typophile.com/files/no_country_for_old_men_1.jpg) | 56.61 KB |
author: hslee511

comments.content:
Nice collection of 19th Century heavy Egyptians. For a recent discussion of the condensed letters, e.g. E, M, R, Y see [http://typophile.com/node/103942](http://web.archive.org/web/20130831055057/http:/typophile.com/node/103942 "http://typophile.com/node/103942").  
Don
